divs: Sighting DetailsBack in the month of April of this year I had the priviledge of seeing star-like UFO's during the daytime over Phoenix, for almost 2 weeks, and then....nothing. Well I was just outside and watching a plane fly over the city and sure enough there was my star-like UFO way up, probably around 50-60 thousand feet over Phoenix. I only noticed it because it was blinking on and off in a regular manner and then after about 10 minutes of observing it, the UFO just winked out of existence. I really hope that this means that I will be seeing these UFO's again on a daily basis. I wonder what they are doing during the daylight hours over Phoenix? Keep your eyes trained on the skies and maybe you will get lucky too !
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around May 28th 2008
Summary: They're baaaaack !!! Star-like UFO over Phoenix - Daylight sighting !
